data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Maghsoudlou, Abdolvahab, Momtazi, Farzaneh (2014): A new Imogine species (Turbellaria: Polycladida: Stylochidae) associated with rock oysters (Saccostrea cucullata) from the Persian Gulf, with a review of the genus. Zootaxa 3753 (4): 364-374, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3753.4.5
